name: pzprv3
description: Playing and editing puzzles by Javascript
author: sabo2

scripts.release: eslint --cache --quiet src && npm run clean && grunt release
scripts.release:gzip: sh -c 'cd dist; tar czf $0 --exclude *.concat.js --exclude .DS_Store *; mv $0 ..' pzprv3-$npm_package_version.tar.gz
scripts.release:bz2: sh -c 'cd dist; tar cjf $0 --exclude *.concat.js --exclude .DS_Store *; mv $0 ..' pzprv3-$npm_package_version.tar.bz2
